org.eclipse.viatra.integration.mwe2

Interface ICompositeStep

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DoWhileLoop, ForEachLoop, ForLoop, Parallel, Sequence, TransformationChain, WhileLoop

    public interface ICompositeStep
    This interface contains the functions of a composite transformation step. these composite steps contain other transformation steps that are executed in a serialized fashion. These transformation steps send information among each other using different specific parameterized messages.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addStep(ITransformationStep step)
      Via this method ITransformationStep objects can be added to the composite step.
      java.util.List<ITransformationStep> getStep()
      Via this method ITransformationStep objects can be queried.

    • Method Detail

      • addStep

        void addStep(ITransformationStep step)
        Via this method ITransformationStep objects can be added to the composite step. These transformation steps represent the different simple and complex (loop, sequence) steps in a complex transformation chain (For example: Model to model transformation, code generation...)
        Parameters:
        step -

      • getStep

        java.util.List<ITransformationStep> getStep()
        Via this method ITransformationStep objects can be queried. These transformation steps represent the different simple and complex (loop, sequence) steps in a complex transformation chain (For example: Model to model transformation, code generation...).
        Parameters:
        step -
